draughts

Class Draughts

  • java.lang.Object
    • draughts.Draughts
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Player, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener

    public class Draughts
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, Player, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.WindowListener
    A class to start a new game of English Draughts. Rules for the game: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/English_draughts
